content: The fathers of modern science – Copernicus, Galileo, Kepler, Newton, Boyle, and many others – saw clear evidence of design in the universe and, in fact, were inspired to discover the laws of nature by their faith in a transcendent lawgiver.
translations: ita:I padri della scienza moderna – Copernico, Galileo, Keplero, Newton, Boyle e molti altri – videro chiare prove del diseg
